title: Computer Networks
content:
OSI Model

7 Layers: Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, Application.

TCP/IP Model

4 Layers: Network Interface, Internet, Transport, Application.

  • TCP vs UDP: TCP is reliable (connection-oriented), UDP is fast (connectionless).
  • HTTP/HTTPS: HyperText Transfer Protocol. S stands for Secure (uses SSL/TLS).
